name: Super Block World
description:
We've seen Mario always be playable in games, but what if you were to play AS A BLOCK? Take control of ?, a playable block on a journey to save his lover; Princess ? from the evil King ?

__________________________

Controls:

Left / Right Arrow = Move

Down Arrow = Enter Pipe

X = Jump / Hold to glide

__________________________
